title.narrative: Zambia - Mining and Environmental Remediation and Improvement Project

description.narrative: To reduce environmental health risks to the local population in critically polluted mining areas in Chingola, Kabwe, Kitwe and Mufulira municipalities, including lead exposure in Kabwe municipality

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Finance, Republic of Zambia
Ministry of Mines and Mineral Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Audit | Description :Section II B (3). The recipient shall ensure and cause each project implementationentity to have its financial statement audited in accordance with the provision of section 4.09 (b) of the general conditions. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Agreement with each of the municipalities | Description :Schedule 2, Section I. D1. Forthe purposes of implementing Part 3.2 of the Project by Chingola, Kitwe and Mufulira Municipalities, the Recipient shall providefinancing to the Chingola, Kitwe and Mufulira Municipalities, and enter into a Project Implementation Agreement each of themunicipalities For purposes of implementing Part 2.1 of the Project by Radiation Protection Authority (RPA), the Recipient shallenter into a Project Implementation Agreement with RPA. | Due Date :31-May-2017

Finance Agreement :Selection of Beneficiaries and Sub-projects | Description :Section I. E 1. For purposes of carrying out theSub-projects under Part 3.2(a) of the Project, the Recipient shall select Beneficiaries and Sub-projects in accordance with thecriteria, conditions and procedures set out in the Project Implementation Manual and enter into a Sub-project Grant Agreement withthe Beneficiary. | Frequency :Yearly
